story:
You can't. The shaking continues, and suddenly there is a CRUNCH!!! and the whole hotel stars tilting.
Soon the beds slides over to the window. You look out. Suddenly the shaking stops.
You see cracks in the ground all over outside. Some are up to 10 feet across and all are who knows how deep.
Do you throw your bed out the window and jump out too hoping you will land on the bed, try to go to sleep,
lay in bed awake, or run out into the hallways and down the stairs?
